author: Warodom Geamsakul and Takashi Matsuda and Tetsuya Yoshida and Hiroshi Motoda and Takashi Washio
title: Constructing a Decision Tree for Graph Structured Data
venue: Institute of Scientific and Industrial Research, Osaka University
window: is employed to extract good enough discriminative patterns within the greedy search framework. Pessimistic pruning is incorporated to avoid overfitting to the training data. Experiments using a DNA dataset were conducted to see the effect of the beam width, the number of chunking at each node of a decision tree, and the pruning.
